title: shiva shiva ena
sahitya:
shiva shiva ena ninai manamE jIvan mukti anubhavamAm


anupallavi

  bhavahara pashupati girIsha parama yOgi Om mahEsha


caraNam 1    kili koNDu paghai vIDum un kEDugaLellAm vADum
puliyinum koDum kAmam unnuT-pughalinri vendu pOmE
    caraNam 2    aghaviruLiDar vADum unnai aruT-shuDaroLi nADum
ihapara sukham kUDum pollA yama bhayam shollAdODum
shankara shashidhara jaTAdhara gangAdhara gauri manOhara
